metadata.title: CVE-2023-2001 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before15.10.8, all versions starting from 15.11 before 15.11.7, all versionsstarting from 16.0 before 16.0.2. An attacker was able to spoof protectedtags, which could potentially lead a victim to download malicious code.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
